entity.name: Dena Grayson
entity.description: an American medical doctor, researcher and politician

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DrDenaGrayson Tragic. CoronaVirus is impacting psychological health world over and those who are fighting it at the frontline bear this pain more. I would blame political leadership for not doing enough for psychological needs of the people.
